Claim: "Green activists are at war with something"
Implication: "Something is the greatest American foe since the Axis Powers"
Referring expressions: Green activists, something  Something, American, axis powers
Formula: (exists a (IsAtWarWith(a))) -> (exists c (exists b (exists a (IsTheGreatest(a) and (IsAmerican(b) and IsAxisPowers(c))))))
